abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column cautions against investing in mutual funds offering higher-than-usual income from exotic investments; says not all perils in riskier funds are disclosed; points out even when risks are discussed, many investors may still not understand how funds really operate.
lead_paragraph: Leveraged loans, a kind of obligation held by floating-rate income funds, carry risks that are often not fully disclosed to investors.

headline.main: Vague Disclosures by Highflying Mutual Funds May Put Investors in Peril

snippet: Leveraged loans, a kind of obligation held by floating-rate income funds, carry risks that are often not fully disclosed to investors.
